0.text: Innate: Fizz is permanently  ghosted, and takes 4 (+ 1% AP)  reduced pre-mitigation damage from every instance of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.

Active: Fizz  dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, and upon colliding with them or if they are still within 200 units when the dash ends, he deals them magic damage plus 100% AD physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: Fizz can cast  Seastone Trident and  Chum the Waters during Urchin Strike, but not  Playful.

0.text: Passive: Fizz's basic attacks rend enemies  on-hit, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, refreshing  on-hit.

1.text: Active: Fizz's next basic attack within 4 seconds has an  uncancelable windup, deals bonus magic damage and gains  50 bonus range.

2.text: If Seastone Trident kills its target, its  cooldown is reduced to 1 second and refunds  mana. Otherwise, if Seastone Trident doesn't kill its target, Fizz's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage  on-hit for the next 5 seconds.

3.text: Seastone Trident  resets Fizz's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Fizz becomes  untargetable and  vaults to the target location while balancing on his trident. Fizz gains the ability to cast  Trickster after a 0.15-second delay until he begins to jump off the trident.

1.text: Over 0.75 seconds, Fizz then hops off his trident and splashes onto the ground below him, becoming targetable again and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  slowing them for 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Fizz dismounts from his trident and  dashes toward the target location in quick succession. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies. The damage dealt is the same as  Playful's, but in a smaller radius, and without applying the  slow.

1.text: Both  Playful's and Trickster's  dashes may be directed separately.

0.text: Active: Fizz throws down a lure at the target location that attracts a shark, granting  sight of the area before emerging and chomping at the lure after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies,  knocking them back and  slowing them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted; increasing Chum the Waters'  damage, slow, eruption radius and knock back distance.

1.text: Guppy (<455): 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knock back distance.

2.text: Chomper (455-910): 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knock back distance.

3.text: Gigalodon (>910): 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knock back distance.

4.text: Enemy  champions can intercept the lure while it is in flight, which attaches to them upon contact and causes the shark to emerge at their position after the same delay. The lure's holder is  slowed and  revealed for the duration and afterwards is impacted by the eruption but is  knocked up for 1 second instead of knocked back.

5.text: Chum the Waters will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Soulrend: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending upon damaging new champions (40 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
